sentences.sContent: In the somber archives of a sedate museum a large archaic volume is somewhat conspicuously displayed.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the somber archives of a sedate museum a large archaic volume is somewhat conspicuously displayed.
sentences.sCn: 在一个平静的博物馆中昏暗的档案室里，一本厚厚的古书被摆在了很显著的位置。

sentences.sContent: Her 71-year-old husband, looking somber and composed, was brought into the church in a wheelchair and did not speak at the service.
sentences.sContent_eng: Her 71-year-old husband, looking somber and composed, was brought into the church in a wheelchair and did not speak at the service.
sentences.sCn: 凯西71岁高龄的丈夫被人用轮椅推进教堂，看起来沉默忧郁，在葬礼仪式上也没有发言。

sentences.sContent: Don't ignore it because it makes you laugh — director Paul Feig's 2011 hit deserves as much respect as any somber, wintry, subtitled drama.
sentences.sContent_eng: Don't ignore it because it makes you laugh — director Paul Feig's 2011 hit deserves as much respect as any somber, wintry, subtitled drama.
sentences.sCn: 不要因为它让你开怀大笑而忽略了它——总监保罗·法伊格在2011年引起的这场轩然大波与其他任何忧郁、寒冷、次要的戏剧一样值得尊重。

synos.tran: 忧郁的；昏暗的；严峻的；阴天的

words.tran: 阴沉地；光线昏暗地；忧郁地；严峻地；颜色暗淡地
昏暗地；阴沉沉地；忧郁地；严肃地
